Volkshaus, Basel, Switzerland 5 Bands competed (mixed Brass/Wind)
Best Work: Stratosphere, O.M. Schwarz (BO Musikschule Reinach) Soloist Prize: Romance Opus 36, W. Van der Beek (Solo Waldhorn - Knaben- und Mädchenmusik Basel) Special Price: JBB Früh Frech for an 'exciting and entertaining Show-Programme'
Winner: JM Gilgenberg (Wind Band), 182 Points
